pr_title: Fix paging APIs to include headers and host params in next page call

timeline.message: Fix paging APIs to include headers and host params in next page call

timeline.bodyText: Will azure-core work correctly, when host and nextLink both contains host part of the URL?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: @weidongxu-microsoft  yes, this is how the previous version of autorest also generated the code which worked with azure core. So, this should work.
replies.author: srnagar
weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: nit. Will it be better to put @HostParam before @PathParam? Not important since this method will not be exposed to user.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft
srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Any idea what caused this change? Is it due to the additional host?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Yes, this is due to the addition of host param
replies.author: srnagar
